entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:13 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 7:13 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:13 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
